entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:54 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 early in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
